title: Is there a way to report a player(s) after dodging champ select?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hi, I joined a champ select to immediately be berated by a player in the lobby. I ended up asking what his problem was, and come to find out that they were a "4 man" and that I would be reported after the game by all four of them. This was after being told to Kill myself and banning out my champion for absolutely 0 reason other than my name. Here is them saying I will be reported because they are a four man when I was flamed. Behavior like this actually kills my mood completely and makes me not want to play. [(https://i.gyazo.com/0f6345758d51df2bded4883d7845f022.png)]

EDIT: I've added two screenshots where I blur out their names, but can provide their names if need be. It's just really upsetting.

replies.body: Keep those screenshots and shoot them over to our Player Behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)! They'll be able to take a look for ya and see what needs to be done.
